Hyprland.name: Hyprland
Hyprland.description: Hyprland is an independent, highly customizable, dynamic tiling Wayland compositor that doesn't sacrifice on its looks.

hyprland-wiki.name: hyprland-wiki
hyprland-wiki.description: The Hyprland Wiki Pages, automatically synced with the website.

grim.name: grim
grim.description: Grab images from a Wayland compositor

slurp.name: slurp
slurp.description: Select a region in a Wayland compositor

hyprlauncher.name: hyprlauncher
hyprlauncher.description: A multipurpose and versatile launcher / picker for Hyprland

hyprpaper.name: hyprpaper
hyprpaper.description: Hyprpaper is a wayland wallpaper utility with IPC controls.

walker.name: walker
walker.description: Multi-Purpose Launcher with a lot of features. Highly Customizable and fast.
